name: Don't Mess with Pawpaw
description:
Pawpaw needs his sleep!
Tap the screen when the time is right to help Pawpaw knock out noisy creatures in the basement.
Creatures get stronger over time, buy upgrades to make Pawpaw stronger!

Controls: Left mouse button

Game is also available on Google Play store

:) Buy me a coffee: ko-fi.com/pymaker
